identity.name: HALIYOL
identity.archetype: Soft Utility with a Fresh Twist
identity.mission: Connect homeowners with reliable carpet cleaning services through a seamless, fresh digital experience.

primary.name: Fresh Sky
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key icons

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Dominant (Freshness). Dark mode exists but is secondary.
colors.gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero sections: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-sky-50 to-stone-100'.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16. Avoid cramped layouts.

grid_systems.marketing: Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric columns (col-span-4, col-span-8).
grid_systems.dashboard: Control Room Grid (Mode B). Dense but breathable. Sidebar layout.

layout.radius: rounded-xl or rounded-2xl for cards. rounded-full for buttons.

components.strategy: Hybrid. Custom HTML/Tailwind for Marketing. Shadcn/UI for App/Dashboard.
customization_rules: Override default Shadcn heights (h-9 -> h-auto) for better accessibility.

specific_components.buttons: Pill-shaped or soft-rounded. Hover: scale-105 transition-transform.
specific_components.cards: Flat with subtle border (border-stone-200). Hover: shadow-lg transition-shadow.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used sparingly on sticky headers and floating modals. 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80'.

images.strategy: Authentic, bright, clean. Avoid generic 3D renders.

sources.description: Bright living room with clean carpet
sources.usage: Hero section background or main visual

sources.description: Professional carpet cleaning machine in action
sources.usage: Service details or 'How it works' section

auth.layout: Split screen. Left: Form. Right: Inspiring Image (Clean home).

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
All interactive elements must have hover/focus states.
